text: I wish the buzzing in my head would stop. I keep looking at the scissors on my desk. Just need five minutes of peace.
label: self-harm

text: It’s 90 degrees out and I’m wearing a long sleeve hoodie. If anyone saw my arms, I don’t know what I would say. I hate feeling like this secret is killing me.
label: self-harm

text: I made it 78 days. Seventy-eight. And for what? I'm so angry at myself for losing the streak and having to start over.
label: self-harm

text: The noise is so loud I just want to smash something, maybe just hit my head against the wall until I can think straight.
label: self-harm

text: The inside of my chest hurts so bad. I just need a sharp distraction, something that hurts on the outside instead of the awful deep down feeling.
label: self-harm

text: I'm working on breaking the cycle of negative self-talk this week. Healing starts with confronting the inner critic and choosing kindness instead. 🌱 #SelfCompassion #MentalWellness
label: safe

text: After a demanding few months, I'm focusing on radical self-repair. Actively rebuilding resilience and strengthening my emotional reserves. Recovery is essential for growth. 💪 #SelfCareJourney #Resilience
label: safe

text: I genuinely cannot take another day of this pain. It feels like everyone would be better off if I just disappeared tonight.
label: suicide

text: I deleted all my social media contacts yesterday. No need for them anymore. I'm sorry to everyone I let down.
label: suicide

text: The world is too dark, and I’m ready to cash out my chips. I know exactly what I need to do to finally make this stop.
label: suicide

text: I tried so hard, but I failed. I’m thinking about using all the meds in the cabinet just to sleep forever.
label: suicide

text: I’m done fighting. I just wrote my note. Thank you to the few people who were kind. This is it.
label: suicide

text: The lowest points are often the start of the greatest comebacks. If you are struggling, remember that perseverance is a superpower. Focus on building up your resilience, one step at a time. #MentalWellnessJourney #KeepGoing #Resilience
label: safe

text: Choosing hope, even when things feel darkest, is an act of incredible strength. You don't have to navigate challenging times alone—there are people ready to listen. Your turning point is always closer than it seems. #StrengthInVulnerability #SupportIsAvailable #MentalHealth
label: safe

text: If he keeps pushing me like this, I swear I'm going to snap. I can't guarantee what will happen when he gets home tonight.
label: violence

text: My face is starting to bruise but I told work I fell down the stairs. I just need a safe place to go where he can't find me.
label: violence

text: They all laugh at me, but they won't be laughing for long. I've had enough of this treatment, time to make them pay attention.
label: violence

text: Don't ignore my calls again or I will come over right now and smash everything you own. You know I'm serious.
label: violence

text: I broke the door when I lost my temper last night. I regret it, but that kind of rage scares me. I feel like I'm losing control completely.
label: violence

text: Nothing beats the raw, positive force of nature. Feeling recharged after witnessing the intense rush of the rapids today. 🌊 #PowerOfNature #Intensity #Force
label: safe

text: Ready to stop holding back and unleash that creative impact you've been sitting on. This week's goal: make your ideas impossible to ignore. ✨ #UnleashYourPotential #CreativeImpact #GoalSetting
label: safe

text: I honestly don't know if I'm going crazy or if he actually said those awful things. He keeps telling me I'm the one who needs therapy and that I always 'misremember' what he does.
label: abuse

text: He took my bank card again this morning and said I don't need any money since I never leave the house anyway. I feel so trapped.
label: abuse

text: The fight last night was terrifying. He started throwing things and punching holes in the wall right next to where I was standing. I'm scared to go home today.
label: abuse

text: Why does he insist on checking my phone logs and DMs every single night? I feel like I'm not allowed to have any private conversations with my friends anymore.
label: abuse

text: I need someone, anyone, to help me figure out how to get out of this situation safely. I feel completely isolated and I don't know where to turn for shelter.
label: abuse

text: We don't just use our products; we put them through the paces. Our quality guarantee encourages customers to truly test the limits and see how much heavy use they can handle. Show us your toughest environment! #DurabilityTested #HeavyUse
label: safe

text: It's been one of those intense weeks. I think I'm officially abusing my new unlimited data plan streaming all the documentaries I missed. Worth it! What's your current resource you're maxing out? #TestingLimits #Overdrive
label: safe

text: I took all the pills I had left. I just want the pain to stop forever.
label: overdose

text: What's the point? I have enough fentanyl sitting here to make everything quiet. Maybe I should finally use it.
label: overdose

text: Woke up feeling nauseous and confused. Did I take too many last night? I don't remember much.
label: overdose

text: Mixing these Xanax and whiskey because I need to black out until Monday. I don't care if it's too much.
label: overdose

text: I just grabbed the full bottle of Tylenol PM. This is my exit plan.
label: overdose

text: The garden is giving us a full saturation point of color today. Pure visual overload in the best way possible! 🌸🌼🌱 #SpringBloom #ColorOverload
label: safe

text: Taking a much-needed mental break this weekend. Planning a serious 'overload' of relaxation and quality time with my favorite book. 📚😌 #RelaxationSaturation #WeekendVibes
label: safe
